section.title: qsc_kyber_poly Struct Reference

para.para: Contains an N sized array of 16bit coefficients. /n Elements of R_q = Z_q[X] / (X^n + 1). /n Represents polynomial coeffs[0] + X * coeffs[1] + X^2 * xoeffs[2] + ... + X^{n-1} * coeffs[n-1].

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Contains an N sized array of 16bit coefficients. /n Elements of R_q = Z_q[X] / (X^n + 1). /n Represents polynomial coeffs[0] + X * coeffs[1] + X^2 * xoeffs[2] + ... + X^{n-1} * coeffs[n-1].
